When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

card.name: Whip-Spine Drake
card.text: Flying Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Whitemane Lion
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wipe Away
card.text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Yavimaya Dryad
card.text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) When Yavimaya Dryad enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped under target player's control. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Yawgmoth, Thran Physician
card.text: Protection from Humans Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card. {B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Yixlid Jailer
card.text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
card.text: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
card.text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
